original_title: The Cox Plate: Race of the Century
overview: Bonecrusher and Our Waverley Star... it was the race of the century, the stuff of sporting legends.  It's all captured here in this tribute to the Cox Plate, Australia's race of races. Race of the Century also brings you other great Cox Plate winners: Tulloch and Gunsynd, Kingston Town and Noholme, Surround and Tobin Bronze.
tagline: A tribute to the Cox Plate; "Where Legends are Made"
title: The Cox Plate: Race of the Century
